author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #41485

This PR updates the L1T Menu tag in the MC GTs for 2023/2024/Run4 to the latest available tag, i.e. `L1Menu_Collisions2023_v1_1_0-v2_xml`, as requested in [this CMSTalk message](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/update-of-the-2023-l1-menu-tag-l1menu-collisions2023-v1-1-0/23386/3).

In addition, the `run3_[data|hlt]_relval` symbolic GTs are updated as well with the same tag via the autoCondModifier `L1TUtmTriggerMenuForRelValForRun3`.

As per @missirol's request I also updated the same tag in `Configuration/HLT/python/autoCondHLT.py`

*EDIT:*
Following the request in [this CMSTalk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/request-for-new-run3-hi-mc-gt-with-updated-l1-menu-for-130x/23559) we have also updated the HI MC GTs for 2022 and 2023 with the correct L1Menu tag (`L1Menu_CollisionsHeavyIons2022_v1_1_0-d1_xml`)

FYI @caruta

The GT differences are:
- **2022 realistic HI**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_HI_v4/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_HI_v5
 - **2023 design**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_design_v5/130X_mcRun3_2023_design_v6
 - **2023 realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v7/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v8
 - **2023 cosmic realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v6/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v7
 - **2023 cosmic design**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v5/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v6
 - **2023 realistic HI**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_HI_v12/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_HI_v14
 - **2024 realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v5/130X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v6
 - **Phase2 realistic**:
 https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun4_realistic_v3/130X_mcRun4_realistic_v7

#### PR validation:
See master PR for the validation

#### Backport:
Backport of #41485
title: [13_0_X] Update L1T Menu tag for 2023/2024/Run4 in MC GTs
